[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/module-minifier](./module-minifier.md) &gt; [IWorkerPoolMinifierOptions](./module-minifier.iworkerpoolminifieroptions.md) &gt; [maxThreads](./module-minifier.iworkerpoolminifieroptions.maxthreads.md)

## IWorkerPoolMinifierOptions.maxThreads property

Maximum number of worker threads to use. Will never use more than there are modules to process. Defaults to os.cpus().length

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
maxThreads?: number;
```
